About Me

I am graduate student in Computer Sciences with specialization in Data Management and Information Processing at University of Trento.


I am did my thesis on correlation aware time series analysis.

Professional Exp. Software Engineer (back-end)

I worked at Convo, as a software engineer in 2014. Wile, I was planing to move back to Pakistan but latter changed my mind. I worked on development and optimization of server side back-end web services using PHP, JAVA, and Oracle 11g.

Research Assistant (RA)

I have worked as Research Assistant with Atif Alvi at LUMS from 2010 to 2011. Here, I worked on development of CBR (Case-Based Reasoning engine) based resource recommendation system for pervasive environments.

Professional Exp. Software Engineer

I worked at Elixir Technologies Corporation, as a software engineer from 2008 – 2010. I worked on development of the ETL (Extraction, Transformation & Loading) layer of "Tango" platform called "Data Manager/Server". Data Manager is a very agile ETL (Extraction-Transformation-Loading of data) solution using C++ and is not just limited to be part of Tango. We designed and made it usable on cloud and locally alike. It is a combination of fast back-end and innovative UI, using on-demand plugins to reduce memory foot print. It is available of all major plateforms.

Favourite Quotes:

Do not be afraid of the developers — we generally don’t eat people, at least usually we don’t. ~__~ (Inspired from Gentoo)

"Do not be satisfied with the stories that come before you. Unfold your own myth." — Rumi

My Research Publications

My research interests include "Data Analytics", "Pattern Recognition", and "Operation Research".
